trans-unit.source: Represents a selectable <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that can contain text and images.
trans-unit.target: Representa um selecionável <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> que pode conter texto e imagens.

trans-unit.source: Use ToolStripButton to create a toolbar button that supports both text and images.
trans-unit.target: Use ToolStripButton para criar um botão de barra de ferramentas que oferece suporte a texto e imagens.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextAlign%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties to get or set the positioning of ToolStripButton images and text.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextAlign%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Propriedades para obter ou definir o posicionamento do texto e imagens ToolStripButton.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextAlign%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can display a ToolStripButton with various border styles, and you can use it to represent and activate operational states.
trans-unit.target: Você pode exibir um ToolStripButton com vários estilos de borda, e você pode usá-lo para representar e ativar os estados operacionais.

trans-unit.source: You can also define it to have the focus by default.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode defini-la para que o foco por padrão.

trans-unit.source: Although ToolStripButton replaces and extends the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> control of previous versions, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use.
trans-unit.target: Embora ToolStripButton substitui e estende o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>controle de versões anteriores, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>é mantido para compatibilidade com versões anteriores e o uso futuro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref> class that displays the specified image.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref> classe que exibe a imagem especificada.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> that displays only an image on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>que exibe apenas uma imagem em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>

trans-unit.source: The image to display on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A imagem a ser exibida sobre o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref> class that displays the specified text.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref> classe que exibe o texto especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> that displays only text on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>que exibe apenas o texto em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref> class that displays the specified text and image.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref> classe que exibe o texto especificado e a imagem.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> that displays both an image and text.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>que exibe uma imagem e texto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The image to display on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A imagem a ser exibida sobre o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref> class that displays the specified text and image and that raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref> classe que exibe o texto especificado e a imagem e que gera a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> that displays both an image and text and raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> event when clicked.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>que exibe uma imagem e texto e gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click>evento quando clicado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The image to display on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A imagem a ser exibida sobre o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An event handler that raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Um manipulador de eventos que gera a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref> class with the specified name that displays the specified text and image and that raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref> classe com o nome especificado, que exibe o texto especificado e a imagem e que gera a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> with the specified name that displays both an image and text and raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> event when clicked.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>com o nome especificado que exibe uma imagem e texto e gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click>evento quando clicado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The image to display on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A imagem a ser exibida sobre o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An event handler that raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Um manipulador de eventos que gera a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether default or custom <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> text is displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se padrão ou personalizado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref> texto é exibido no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Set the AutoToolTip property to `false` to display custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ToolTipText%2A> on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: Defina a propriedade AutoToolTip como `false` exibir personalizado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ToolTipText%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if default <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> text is displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se padrão <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref> texto é exibido; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref> can be selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref> pode ser selecionado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref> can be selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref> pode ser selecionado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref> is pressed or not pressed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref> é pressionado ou não pressionado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref> is pressed in or not pressed in; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref> está pressionado ou não pressionado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.Checked*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.Checked*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref> should automatically appear pressed in and not pressed in when clicked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref> devem aparecer pressionado automaticamente e não pressionado quando clicado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref> should automatically appear pressed in and not pressed in when clicked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref> devem aparecer pressionado automaticamente e não pressionado quando clicado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref> is in the pressed or not pressed state by default, or is in an indeterminate state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref> está no estado pressionado ou não pressionado por padrão, ou está em um estado indeterminado.

trans-unit.source: Set the CheckState to `Indeterminate` when you do not want to set a default state.
trans-unit.target: Definir o CheckState `Indeterminate` quando você não deseja definir um estado padrão.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Unchecked" name="Unchecked" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_Unchecked" name="Unchecked" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído não é um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckState*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckState*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckState*>

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo objeto de acessibilidade para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call CreateAccessibilityInstance, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Se você não chama explicitamente CreateAccessibilityInstance, ele será chamado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibilityObject%2A>propriedade é referenciada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Para obter ou definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibilityObject%2A>propriedade, você deve adicionar uma referência para o `Accessibility` assembly instalado com o .NET Framework.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether to display the ToolTip that is defined as the default.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se deseja exibir a dica de ferramenta que é definida como o padrão.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref> can be fitted.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o tamanho de uma área retangular na qual um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref> pode ser ajustado.

trans-unit.source: The specified area for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A área especificada para um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An ordered pair of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Um par ordenado de tipo <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa a largura e altura de um retângulo.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckedChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckedChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnCheckedChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnCheckedChanged também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.target: O método OnCheckStateChanged também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
